Name: Caterva
About the game: Caterva is a top-down rougelike shooter where you control a multitude of clone slaves. And you have to lead the way to the exit. The more slaves you save, the more powerful and vulnerable you will become. All the clones have their own weapon and fire them at one, so when you get a lot of slaves you become incredibly deadly.
